content: Blackjack.fun is an online crypto casino platform that provides both in-house and partner games. We accept various cryptocurrencies. Blackjack.fun has been operating since 2018. With updates and improvements every week since, the platform aims to compete with older, bigger sites. Blackjack.fun's greatest achievement is its community. The members can get involved in the functionality of the platform, they can bring improvements, change various aspects of the experience, and even suggest games. All these are meant to provide their members with a unique experience, an honest, transparent, and safe approach, and a place shaped based on their perspective.We are looking for some telegram users who will post about our new promotion Rush hour events by Helena in other telegram gambling groups. We will pay $1.5/post and a max of 2 posts in two groups.Rules and RequrementsYou must join in this group https://t.me/Blackjack_fun_VIPBrand-new accounts are not allowed.Alternative accounts are not acceptedMax 2 telegram posts per userYou can not post in the same group where someone already posted.You have to share in the gambling gaming-related telegram groupNo payment if the group is not gambling gaming related.You must use the post format from below.You can not delete the post that you will do for this campaign in at least 1 monthIf a DT tags you for a legitimate reason you can not participate in this campaignIf you don't follow the requirements you will not get paid.Payment will be sent directly to the participant's blackjack fun wallet in TRX (You can withdraw it anytime)I have the right to stop the campaign any time we want.PaymentA maximum of $3 worth of TRX will be credited to your blackjack.fun wallet for 2 telegram group postTelegram Post FormatCode: üéâ Join our host Allesandra every day between 9 AM to 11 AM UTC in a unique live event! üéäüí∞ Hourly competitions rewards are increased, with RakeBack RushHour up to 70% for everyone! üí∏üéÆ Trivia games with prizes, rain, tips, and many more surprises await! üéÅ Let's have fun! üòÉ‚úÖ Join Now https://blackjack.fun/You must have to attach the video to your telegram post.
